issue.title: webserver.example.ts.net
issue.body:

issue.title: www.pornhub.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://www.pornhub.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pornhub.com%2F) ### Comment > any google search or any links anywhere related to pornhub did not open in new tab it can opened in the same search tab only although the link https://www.pornhub.com/ without any extra url or id open in new tab normally. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/6zwad2eosu0wggcok84gk08cccsgo4c7t4vigto13s.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/tdg629kdykg4o04scooswswcgg00goo4au8k0mgsp4.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.4.22 System version: | Windows 7 Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:

issue.title: rutracker.org

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://rutracker.org/forum/index.php](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frutracker.org%2Fforum%2Findex.php) ### Comment > (Russian below) > - search from the main page doesn't work > - if pasting the link with search terms directly in address bar, the search result don't load > - hidden text doesn't show on pages > - in general the website works slowly > - (!) pausing Adguard on the website doesn't help, only quitting the app helps. > > == > - не работает поиск с главной страницы > - если скопировать ссылку с поиском в адресную строку то все равно поиск не работает, результаты не грузятся > - текст под катом не открывается > - в целом сайт работает очень медленно > - (!) не помогает даже добавить сайт в вайтлист, помогает только полностью выйти из приложения. > > Помогите пожалуйста :( Username: `@linthout` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/o8s771iujjks04wcc080088k8sw80cw736pvedtihk.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ivvy6ys55nkks4s0kog4s4s00cco8048bh8ryrkqt4.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/redccfdlsjk4soc48wgogokskg4s44sg6yekuipe7s.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/sv7b96gzok08wcs48ws44w8c0occw88okhmzr1j5rk.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/mxul4fu2hvk0884g0wso8cooksk40kgg3e8h6m5eco.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pup5e50yj2808wwgggo04g84w8gkc0g300k40ox8hs.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.15.1.1733 nightly System version: | MacOS Ventura 13.6.7 Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `system default`

comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -5,6 +5,11 @@
 ! Bad: .org/ads/$domain=example.org (for instance, should be in speficic.txt)
 !
 !
+! server-side GTM pattern B ex. https://load.ss.esade.edu/ykpgwaiz.js?st=5V4W3ZR
+!+ NOT_PLATFORM(ios, ext_safari)
+/\/\/([0-9a-z]+\.){1,}[0-9a-z]+\.[a-z]{2,}\/[a-z]{8}\.js\?st=[0-9A-Z]{6,8}$/$script,~third-party,match-case
+!+ PLATFORM(ios, ext_safari)
+/\/\/([0-9a-z]+\.)?[0-9a-z]+\.[0-9a-z]+\.[a-z][a-z]+\/[a-z]{8}\.js\?st=[0-9A-Z][0-9A-Z][0-9A-Z][0-9A-Z][0-9A-Z][0-9A-Z][0-9A-Z]$/$script,~third-party,match-case
comment.body: Oops, `st=[0-9A-Z][0-9A-Z][0-9A-Z][0-9A-Z][0-9A-Z][0-9A-Z][0-9A-Z]?[0-9A-Z]?$` should work, right? Didn't notice such an easy trick.

pull_request.title: block another pattern of server-side GTM
block another pattern of server-side GTM

issue.title: vk.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://vk.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvk.com) ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/kp4i90rxa9wgkwoow0cg4cw8w84gcc4qx5uir3ik1c.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v1.1.1. System version: | Windows 11, H2O Browser: | Chrome License type: | free AdGuard driver: | TDI Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base Custom filters: | @@||doka2.ru,
@@Chinaski1 Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled ### Import issue configuration (AdGuard for Windows) [Import](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=adguard%3Aimport_user_configuration%3Furl%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fvk.com)

comment.body: Да, похоже редизайн случился у vk. И возможно не всем сразу, поэтому где-то может не воспроизводиться. Раньше реклама в ленте убиралась фильтрами: vk.com,vk.ru#?##feed_rows > div[class="feed_row "] > div[id^="post-"] span.PostHeaderSubtitle__item:contains(Реклама):upward(#feed_rows > div[class="feed_row "]) vk.com,vk.ru#?#.wall_posts > div.post:has(span.PostHeaderSubtitle__item:contains(Реклама в сообществе)) А теперь структура и названия классов поменяли, а ещё слово Реклама не одним словом идёт, а каждая буква отдельно, и вставлены другие случайные буквы: Р h е
